{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Fingerpainting {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Fingerpainting Fingerpaint is a kind of paint intended to be applied with the fingers; it typically comes in pots and is used by small children, though it has occasionally been used by adults either to teach art to children, or for their own use. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fingerpaint)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
